info.author: Canary Health Inc
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
=============
Pyramid-Armor
=============

A Pyramid extension that allows armor_ to play nice with
pyramid-controllers_ and pyramid-describe_.

.. _armor: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/armor
.. _pyramid-controllers: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyramid-controllers
.. _pyramid-describe: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyramid-describe
info.keywords: web wsgi pyramid armor data normalize validate sanitize
info.name: pyramid_armor
info.summary: Pyramid helpers for data validation, sanitization, and documentation.
info.html_description: A Pyramid extension that allows armor to play nice with pyramid-controllers and pyramid-describe.
